actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the collection of information relating to nonimmigrant foreign students and other exchange program participants.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1997 to provide for direct foreign student payment to the Attorney General of the required information fee under the foreign student and exchange program participant information collection program. (Currently such fee is collected and remitted by the institution of higher education or the exchange program.)Extends the deadline for such program's expansion to nationals of all countries.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the collection of information relating to nonimmigrant foreign students and other exchange program participants.
